title: Adaptive Learning Design and Implementation for Higher Education: System-Instructional Integration Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience using digital learning platforms
context.additional_context: Customized language proficiency improvement courses considering learners' diverse levels and work environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five core design principles of adaptive learning systems in practical settings
Learners can optimize personalized learning pathways through learner data analysis in an LMS-based environment
Learners can design adaptive assessment tools (quizzes/assignments) suitable for large-scale learners within corporate settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
